DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 , randomize , double-blind , dose escalation , safety pharmacokinetic study . The study conduct approximately 10 site United States . Up 48 patient high risk AKI ( CCF score ≥ 5 OR estimate GFR ( eGFR ) < 60 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) undergone major cardiovascular surgery participate . Patients receive single IV injection I5NP placebo follow cardiovascular surgery . I5NP administer 4 hour ( +/- 30 minute ) follow removal cardiopulmonary bypass machine ( CBM ) . The duration study approximately 44 day , inclusive 14 day screen period . Patients contact phone 6 12 month follow-up question . Patient visit screen , day surgery , hospital in-patient Days 1 , 2 , 3 - 5 Day 7 hospital discharge . Safety follow-up continue 30 day post-surgery . 2 phone call make 6 12 month date surgery .
DOC.brief_title: A Dose Escalation Safety Study I5NP Prevent Acute Kidney Injury ( AKI ) Patients High Risk AKI Undergoing Major Cardiovascular Surgery ( QRK.004 )

This study test safety I5NP measure long drug stay blood stream injection . This study mean test I5NP protect kidney damage may occur rare case surgery . Another purpose dose escalation study find right dose experimental drug give study subject future study . Even though harmful effect see animal test , know side effect experimental drug might cause human .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( surgery ) : Patient age 21 year 85 year old Patient capable give consent Patient willing able comply visit schedule study procedure include posthospitalization discharge followup Patient undergo major cardiac vascular surgery require use cardiopulmonary bypass machine ( CBM ) Patient cumulative score ≥ 5 Cleveland Clinic Foundation ( CCF ) Acute Kidney Injury ( AKI ) risk factor scale OR patient estimate GFR ( eGFR ) < 60 mL/min/1.73 m2 , determine simplify ( 4variable ) MDRD ( Modification Diet Renal Disease ) equation time Screening/Baseline examination The patient report date normal finding age sexappropriate cancer screening , per American Cancer Society guideline , breast cancer , cervical cancer , rectal cancer , prostate cancer . If patient date , relevant screen test must perform normal result document prior dosing . Inclusion Criteria ( surgery ) : Patient must cardiopulmonary bypass machine ( CBM ) Inclusion Criteria ( surgery ) : Patient must ICU dose facilitate study procedure include PK blood draw PK urine sample Exclusion Criteria ( surgery ) : Patient cancer may predispose due family history : clinical syndrome predisposing malignancy , Familial Polyposis Coli , Von Hippel Landau disease ( associate renal cell cancer renal cyst ) LiFraumeni syndrome ( associate inherit mutation p53 tumorsuppressor gene ) malignancy two first seconddegree relative Patient history abnormality chest Xray could represent malignancy Patient clinically significantly elevate pancreatic and/or hepatic enzyme level , define grade 2 , 3 4 value accord National Cancer Institute ( NCI ) Common Toxicity Criteria Adverse Events ( CTCAE ) , version 3.0 Women childbearing potential exclude study . Every female subject consider childbearing potential unless sterilization surgery , postmenopausal . Women 2159 , postmenopausal define menses least 12 month elevate follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) level . Women 6085 , postmenopausal define menses least 12 month . Patient participate study experimental therapy last 30 day Patient currently receive immunosuppressive therapy [ criterion NOT apply topical steroid inhalation steroid chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) and/or asthma ] Preoperative extracorporeal membrane oxygenation Patient IntraArterial Balloon Pump ( IABP ) Left Ventricular Assist Device ( LVAD ) Evidence patient experience possible AKI prior surgery , define > 1.5 time increase serum creatinine screening time prior surgery Patient comfort measure resuscitate ( DNR ) status Patient participate concurrent interventional study Patient receive intravenous contrast material < 24 hour prior surgery In opinion investigator preoperative concomitant disease clinical/laboratory find significantly raise risk complication postoperative period therefore precludes dose patient Exclusion Criteria ( surgery ) : In opinion investigator , intraoperative complication occur significantly raise risk complication post operative period therefore precludes dose patient Exclusion Criteria ( surgery ) : In opinion investigator , complication occur postoperative period time prior dose significantly raise risk complication therefore precludes dose patient
